SYSTEM: Ontologies%26multilinguality%40wiki_24-01-08.pdf: Página 34
©Guadalupe Aguado de Cea
34
3. Modelling:
A. Including multilingual information in the 
ontology meta-model (1)
• Multilinguality is limited to  
concepts
• By means of 
rdfs:label and 
rdfs:comment
properties to define labels 
and descriptions in NL for 
classes.
• Localization at the 
terminological layer.
• It is the most widespread
modelling modality.
speaker: SYSTEM
